story.title: The Beginning
story.p1: Our journey began in a small workshop in the heart of the Grand Bazaar. Our founder, Aykal Avcı, forged his first ring with a simple belief: Jewelry should not just be an ornament, but an untold story.
story.p2: Thirty years later, we carry this belief in every piece. Every step, from inspiration to the polished stone, is a tribute to tradition and art. In a world of mass production, we choose the power of slow and thoughtful craftsmanship.

ethics.title: Ethical Sourcing
ethics.desc: We are committed to using conflict-free diamonds and 100% recycled gold. The planet is our inspiration.

craft.title: Handmade Craftsmanship
craft.desc: Each piece is finished by hand by our master craftsmen, ensuring a quality no machine can replicate.

custom.title: Bespoke for You
